inning1.commText: N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, 3 runs, goes full and looks for the inswinging toe-crusher, but it's a slot ball and flicked nicely in the gap at mid-wicket. Theekshana had to run a fair bit to the right from deep square leg to save one run
Tanzid Hasan is standing outside the crease
N Thushara to Parvez Hossain Emon, leg byes, 1 run, does get the inswinging full ball, it's a dipping low full toss, Emon misses the flick, gets hit on the pad but easily missing leg

N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, no run, yorker just outside off stump, Tanzid digs it out to mid-off and immediately looks at the bottom of the bat as the sound wasn't right. Checks if he's cracked it, no damage done luckily
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, steps out and yorks himself, Tanzid manages to squeeze it to point
N Thushara to Parvez Hossain Emon, no run, slower delivery, Emon mistimes the drive back to the bowler
N Thushara to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$ Bowled!!

N Thushara to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$ Bowled!! Timbahh! Was looking for the big full inswinger. Wasn't getting it exactly right. To be honest not quite the yorker but a good full inswinger anyway. Emon went through with the expansive drive early, lost one hand on the handle and missed the ball completely to have the leg stump rattled. Thushara gives the early breakthrough for Sri Lanka. B1$
Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, no run, nice cover drive but picks out the man at cover, who makes a pretty good half-stop

Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, no run, fullish and asking for the drive, careful push down the ground as it's swinging away, Binura Fernando does really well to get down low to the right in his followthrough and save at least two runs

Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, oh inside edge onto pad and rolling to short mid-wicket. Tanzid looked to cut this length ball that wasn't too wide, Litton Das is alert to the possibility of a quick single
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, full and on the leg stump, flicked to mid-wicket. Fielder dives to the left inside the circle, Shanaka the man, saved another two there the home side
Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, no run, advances and looks to swing through the line over the infield, but the ball moves away and B0$
Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, B0$ Caught!!

Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, B0$ Caught by Kusal Perera!! Edgeddd and taken! Was coming. The away swing was troubling Tanzid. He tried playing shots but either mistimed them or missed. Binura Fernando got a lovely away shape on this full delivery, Tanzid went for a big drive and got a thick edge. Kusal Perera had to time his stretch-dive to the right to perfection to collect this at short third man. Man at slip was pushed to short third a couple of balls ago and it's gone to him now. Bangladesh in some early trouble here. B1$
N Thushara to Litton Das, 1 run, nice away-swing, Litton taps it to cover-point
N Thushara to Towhid Hridoy, no run, leans forward and plays to cover-point with an angled bat
N Thushara to Towhid Hridoy, no run, back of a length this time, happy back foot defence for Towhid
N Thushara to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, lovely outswinging yorker, Towhid steers it past backward point
N Thushara to Litton Das, no run, B0$! Litton gives the charge to drive this through cover-point, outswing beats the bat

N Thushara to Litton Das, 1 run, excellent yorker aiming base of middle and leg, interestingly dug out off the bat to square leg but Sri Lanka have a soft check with the ump for LBW. They felt boot-first
Shanaka to Litton Das, no run, slower delivery on the stumps, Litton steps out and defends to cover
Shanaka to Litton Das, 1 run, full and outside off stump, square-drive but man back at deep point

Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, B0$, shot! Steps out, gets to the pitch of this slot ball and lofts through the line over wide mid-on for the first maximum of the day. Oh that ball almost hit a photographer and his camera. He moved away last moment and is thankful there was no damage
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, B0$, Towhid wants to counterattack. Again runs down the pitch has a wild swing, thick edge escapes over short third man for another boundary
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, shortish from Shanaka as he saw the batter advance, knocked to square leg
Shanaka to Litton Das, 1 run, knocked to mid-wicket
Theekshana to Litton Das, no run, fullish delivery, Litton pushes it back to the bowler
Theekshana to Litton Das, 1 run, quicker, Litton moves across the stumps to play, knocked towards mid-on
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, 2 runs, lets this ball come and flicks this flatter wide of mid-wicket, in the gap for two
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, shortish delivery, Towhid guides to backward point
Theekshana to Litton Das, no run, backs away this time, Theekshana targets the yorker, squeezed out to cover
Theekshana to Litton Das, 1 run, shortish delivery, Litton backs away now and taps it wide of mid-off
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, driven to mid-off for a single
Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, played towards the off-side for a single
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, B0$, length ball into the slot, Litton gets into a good position and nails this over wide long-on for half-a-dozen
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, pulled through backward square leg for a single
Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, plays this with soft hands into the off-side for a single
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, guided down to short third man by the batsman for a single
Theekshana to Litton Das, 1 run, worked down to long-on
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, no run, flatter delivery, blocked
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, no run, quicker delivery, Towhid defends
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, no run, pushed to the off-side
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, fullish delivery, Towhid clips it to long-on
Theekshana to Litton Das, 1 run, backs away and drives this full delivery to mid-on
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, turning away, Litton clips it to mid-on
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, flatter delivery, Towhid works it to long-on
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, another nudge to backward square leg
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, flatter delivery, Towhid gets behind the line and wrists it to backward square leg
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, nudged around to sweeper cover
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, full delivery, Towhid gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps it to deep square leg
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, short of length delivery on the off stump, Towhid flicks to deep mid-wicket

Shanaka to Litton Das, B0$, short! Short of a length delivery on the stumps, Litton moves across, knows fine leg is up, so just helps it away on its way over fine leg for six more. Clearly they are targetting Shanaka
Shanaka to Litton Das, no run, short and outside off stump, Litton tries to ramp it past the keeper this time but misses
Shanaka to Litton Das, 1 run, drilled straight down the ground
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, full delivery on the leg stump, Towhid flicks behind square and the fifty stand is up
Shanaka to Litton Das, 1 run, full delivery, Litton drives to deep cover
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, short and turning away, Litton cuts to deep point
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, shortish and outside off stump, Towhid late-cuts to short third man

Vandersay to Litton Das, B0$, Kusal Mendis has B1$! Litton Das left the crease early, Vandersay smartly fired that wide of off stump, ball spun away to beat the bat. Mendis fumbled the gather and Litton escaped. Given wide
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, full delivery on the stumps, Litton flicks to deep square leg
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, B0$, the slog-sweep! Full delivery on the stumps, Towhid gets down on one knee and sends it between deep mid-wicket and deep backward square leg
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, quicker delivery, Towhid cuts but can't beat the dive at backward point
Vandersay to Litton Das, 2 runs, goes back and pushes this short delivery to deep cover for a couple
These two have managed to steady the ship. But Bangladesh need to add at least 100 runs in the last 10 overs to challenge Sri Lanka.
Karunaratne to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, starts with a slower ball into the wicket, Towhid guides to third man
Karunaratne to Litton Das, 1 run, moves across the line to pull, man at deep mid-wicket attacks the ball but it doesn't carry
Karunaratne to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, short of length delivery, Towhid cuts to backward point. Pace off again but the timing was good
Karunaratne to Litton Das, no run, B0$! Slower delivery into the wicket, Litton backs away to cut and misses
Karunaratne to Litton Das, 2 runs, played in the air but in the gap at long leg. Shortish slower delivery, Litton moves across and helps the pull, lands safely in the deep
Karunaratne to Litton Das, 2 runs, short of length delivery, Litton backs away and cuts to deep backward point
Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, B0$ Caught!!

Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, B0$ Caught by Kusal Perera!! His second wicket is caught at short third man too and it's again Kusal Perera the man diving, this time forward and low to pouch it neatly. Short slower delivery angling away, Towhid looks to slash hard, gets a thick outside edge and taken at the edge of the circle. Important stand broken. B1$

Binura Fernando to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, mistimes in the air but mistimed so bad that deep square leg couldn't run in and collect. Shortish slower delivery, Mehidy rocked back and edged the pull, got away with it
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, pace off into the wicket, Litton had to wait and pull, mishit to short fine leg
Binura Fernando to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$ Caught!!

Binura Fernando to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$ Caught by N Thushara!! And he has a third now. All he's doing is just bowl cutters into the wicket. This was short and at the body, slower ball of course, Mehidy thought he could move across and scoop, only scooped it straight to short fine leg for some catching practice. B1$
Bangladesh will have to be careful of not losing the plot in the middle-overs again.
Binura Fernando to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, short of length delivery, Shamim knocks it to mid-wicket
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, short of length and pace off, nudged to mid-wicket
Karunaratne to Litton Das, 1 run, short of length delivery, Litton cuts past cover-point

Karunaratne to Shamim Hossain, B0$, wow, that is a top shot. Probably the shot of the game so far. He almost played that with a straight bat and so late to get the placement and timing right. Short of a length delivery angling away, Shamim plays a fierce backfoot cut-drive past backward point and it rocketed to the fence
Karunaratne to Shamim Hossain, no run, swings and misses this time as he tries to play thorugh the off-side
Karunaratne to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, short of length delivery, Shamim taps it to backward point
Karunaratne to Litton Das, 1 run, tapped to extra-cover
Karunaratne to Shamim Hossain, B0$, width, cut, man in the deep dives in vain. Short and wide, Shamim cuts well, delayed the shot as the bowler took pace off but timed it well

Vandersay to Litton Das, B0$, lovely back foot lofted drive! Short and turning away, actually not all that short but Litton played that on the rise and cleared the leaping cover fielder to get four more
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, shortish delivery, Litton nudges to mid-wicket
Vandersay to Shamim Hossain, 2 runs, backs away, Shamim cuts to deep point, comes back quickly for the second run
Vandersay to Shamim Hossain, 2 runs, now the slog-sweep. Oh sliding save almost fumbled to the fence at deep backward square leg. Fullish and on the leg stump, Shamim sends it over the infield
Vandersay to Shamim Hossain, no run, flatter delivery, seemed like the googly, Shamim defends from the crease
Vandersay to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, shortish and outside off stump, Shamim toe-ends the cut to short third man after backing away. Couldn't hit the gap
Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, backs away, looks to drive this full delivery through cover, gets an inside edge that rolls to backward square leg
Theekshana to Litton Das, 1 run, shuffles in the crease and nudges to mid-wicket, tries to steal the second run but man at long-on quickly attacks the ball
Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, shortish delivery, Shamim cuts towards backward point

Theekshana to Litton Das, B0$, in the airrr and he clears long-off. FInally a fifty for Litton Das after 13 innings in this format. This is his B1$as well. That will ease some pressure off him. Played a responsible, captain's knock. Full delivery, Litton lofted through the line and got a maximum
Theekshana to Litton Das, B0$, too wide
Theekshana to Litton Das, 1 run, slapped to long-off

Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, 3 runs, great diving save by Vandersay. That ball was racing off the bat. Shortish delivery, Shamim backs away to cut, hit so well. Vandersay had to cover a lot of ground to the left from third man, dived and pushed the ball with his left hand to save a run
Vandersay to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, googly on the stumps, Shamim pulls to deep mid-wicket
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, shortish and outside off stump, Litton cuts to deep point
Vandersay to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, loses his footing but plays the sweep nicely and sends it to deep square leg

Vandersay to Litton Das, 2 runs, just when you thought Theekshana was improving his fielding in the ODIs with some of his diving grabs, he is back to fumbling catches. B0$. Full delivery turning away, Litton mistimed the slog, ball went towards long-off. Theekshana ran in too much, then tried to reverse cup, ball cleared him
Vandersay to Litton Das, 2 runs, drilled down to long-on and he's back for two

Vandersay to Litton Das, B0$, front leg out of the way for a big hit over mid-wicket to round off the over. Frustrating for Vandersay, should have had a wicket but has nothing against him for 40 runs. Was a slot ball though this one and duly punished by the set Litton
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, leg byes, 1 run, short of a length on leg, Shamim Hossain looks to swipe it away, gets hit on the thigh pad, a leg bye taken
N Thushara to Litton Das, 1 run, back of a length delivery around middle and leg, tad slow as Litton Das nudges it towards wide long-on for a single
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, no run, Shamim Hossain backs away to play this ball, but Thushara fires a wide yorker outside off and manages to keep it inside the tramline

N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, B0$, drilled through covers! Full and wide outside off, Shamim Hossain goes down on his knee and slams this through covers as the ball races away to the fence at the rate of knots
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, B0$, exquisite shot! Regal. Thushara goes full on off and the batsman stands tall and smokes it over long-off for a well timed lofted six. Posed for the cameras too
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, byes, 1 run, full length delivery outside off, Shamim Hossain swings and misses. They have stolen a bye though

Binura Fernando to Shamim Hossain, B0$, nicely shot! Binura Fernando goes short and the batsman has reverse ramped it past the keeper. Mendis tried to grab it by reaching to his left, however, this was placed well past him
Binura Fernando to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, pitched up by the bowler as Shamim Hossain drives this towards mid-on for a single
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, B0$, stand and deliver! On a length around off, right into the slot and Litton Das has clubbed this over wide long-on for half-a-dozen
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, no run, full and wide outside off, Litton Das goes for a drive and misses
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 2 runs, pitched up by the bowler outside off, Litton Das drives it to wide long-off for a couple of runs
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, Litton Das chips it over the infield at covers for a single to end the over
Theekshana to Litton Das, B0$ Caught!!

Theekshana to Litton Das, B0$ Caught by N Thushara!! Litton Das departs after playing a fine knock. Has played a captain's knock. This was a carrom delivery around off, Litton Das swings across the line and the leading edge flies straight to short third man. Theekshana gets the big fish as Bangladesh lose their fifth wicket. Walks back to a standing ovation from his team-mates does the Bangladesh skipper. B1$
Theekshana to Jaker Ali, 2 runs, tad short outside off, punched through covers for a couple of runs by Jaker Ali
Theekshana to Jaker Ali, 1 run, a low full toss that has been flicked towards wide long-on for a single by Jaker Ali

Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, B0$, moves into the 40s! Such a fine knock this has been by Shamim Hossain. This was a short ball by the spinner, a half-tracker and the batsman pulls it towards deep mid-wicket, finds the gap and it's four more

Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, no run, way too full outside off, Shamim Hossain shuffles across in the crease and tries to play this, however, Theekshana goes full and straight outside off, the batsman gets beaten
Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, full toss around off, driven towards cover for a single by Shamim Hossain
Last over of the innings coming up. Thushara with the ball for Sri Lanka..
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, leg byes, 2 runs, fired on leg, Shamim Hossain looks to whip it away, gets hit on the pads though, a couple of leg byes taken

N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, B0$, Shamim Hossain moves closer to his fifty. Short ball on leg, Shamim Hossain swipes it towards fine leg and just manages to clear the fielder stationed at the edge of the boundary. Pumps his bat as he's delighted
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, B0$ Run Out!!

N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, B0$ Jaker Ali Run Out!! A yorker length delivery on leg, Shamim Hossain looks to squeeze this out, but misses. They try to steal a bye, however, Kusal Mendis does well to score a direct-hit with Jaker Ali well short of his crease. Shamim Hossain is well set out in the middle, he should have kept the strike. B1$
N Thushara to Rishad Hossain, B0$ Run Out!!

N Thushara to Rishad Hossain, B0$ Shamim Hossain Run Out!! Back-to-back run-outs by Kusal Mendis. Rishad Hossain gets beaten outside off as he fails to connect the yorker and Mendis has a calm and watchful underarm direct-hit. Shamim is well short and he departs after playing a fine knock of 48. Deserves a round of applause. B1$

N Thushara to Saifuddin, 2 runs, yorker length delivery on middle and leg, Saifuddin whips it through square leg and takes a couple of runs. A flat throw by Shanaka at the keeper's end who whips off the bails, but the batsman makes it with a well-timed dive
N Thushara to Saifuddin, B0$, B1$ This was a full length delivery outside off and the batsman chips it over the infield at covers to draw curtains to the innings

B0$ That's a much better batting performance by Bangladesh as compared to the first T20I where they couldn't score much. The visitors lost their openers early, however, Litton Das and Towhid Hridoy steadied the ship and rebuilt the innings after that. Both were scoring runs at a brisk rate, but Binura Fernando broke that partnership just at the right time. Mehidy Hasan Miraz didn't last long either as Binura Fernando dismissed him in the same over, reducing Bangladesh to 78/4. Just when they were in a spot of bother, Shamim walked in to bat and counterattacked the opposition, dealing in boundaries and rotating the strike at the same time. Litton notched up his fifty following that and Shamim gave the finishing touches. Saifuddin's cameo ensured they got over the 175-run mark. The Bangladesh captain said 180 would be a good score on this surface and they have managed to get somewhat closer to that total. Can Sri Lanka chase it down? Join us back in 10 minutes for the run chase to find out..

Welcome back for the run chase folks! Litton gives the Bangladesh players a peptalk as they gather in a huddle. The two Sri Lankan openers now enter the field. Bangladesh have bowlers who have some useful variations and can be deceptive. Let's see whether they can contain the opposition openers. Here we go!

inning2.commText: Shoriful Islam to Nissanka, no run, pitched up around off, Nissanka drives it to mid-off
Shoriful Islam to Nissanka, 1 run, back of a length delivery around off, cramped for room as Nissanka steers it towards point for one
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Mendis, B0$, that's a juicy full toss, Kusal Mendis stands tall and whips it over mid-wicket for a boundary to open his account
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Mendis, no run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, shapes back sharply, Kusal Mendis swings and misses
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Mendis, leg byes, 1 run, fired on leg, Kusal Mendis tries to flick it away, gets hit on the pads. A leg bye taken
Shoriful Islam to Nissanka, B0$, sprays a wide ball down the leg-side, loses control on that occasion
Shoriful Islam to Nissanka, leg byes, 1 run, cramped for room by this back of a length delivery, clips the thigh pad and rolls towards backward square leg
Saifuddin to Nissanka, no run, starts off with a full toss as Nissanka drills it right back at the bowler
Saifuddin to Nissanka, B0$, short and punished! Rocks back in the crease and pumps the short ball over deep mid-wicket for the first maximum of this innings
Saifuddin to Nissanka, 1 run, back of a length delivery around middle and leg, clipped towards wide mid-on for a single
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, B0$, loose delivery down the leg-side, pitched up by the bowler as Kusal Mendis sweeps it past the fielder at short fine leg. As easy as you like
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, B0$ Run Out!!

Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, B0$ Kusal Mendis Run Out!! He was looking so good, but no Kusal Mendis special tonight. Chops this towards point and calls for a run and Shamim stationed at point is quick to gather the ball. Takes his time and fires a direct-hit at the bowler's end, and Mendis is well short of his crease. Shamim can do nothing wrong today. Played a rollicking knock earlier in the evening, scores a lovely direct-hit to send the in-form batsman back to the pavilion.. B1$
Saifuddin to Nissanka, no run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, squeezed into the off-side by Nissanka
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Perera, no run, back of a length around middle and leg, nudged in front of mid-wicket by Kusal Perera
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Perera, leg byes, 1 run, fired on leg, Kusal Perera looks to whip it away, off the thigh pads towards fine leg
Shoriful Islam to Nissanka, 1 run, pitched up by the bowler around middle and leg, Nissanka heaves it over the umpire who was stationed at square leg. The umpire had to take evasive action
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Perera, no run, short and quick around off, Kusal Perera goes for a pull and gets beaten on the top edge
Shoriful Islam to Kusal Perera, B0$ Caught!!

Shoriful Islam to Kusal Perera, B0$ Caught by Rishad Hossain!! Kusal Perera departs without troubling the scorers. Tad short outside off, Kusal Perera slices it uppishly towards point and Rishad Hossain stationed there has to move to his right. Keeps his eyes on the ball and takes it safely above his head. His height helped him to grab it. Sri Lanka in a spot of bother having lost two wickets already. B1$
Shoriful Islam to Avishka Fernando, no run, on the batsman's pads as Avishka Fernando nudges it in front of square leg
Mustafizur to Nissanka, 1 run, back of a length around off, steered to point by Nissanka for a single

Mustafizur to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, B0$ Pulls the short ball uppishly towards short mid-wicket and Emon stationed there leaps and gets his hands to it. Fails to latch on to the chance though. Would have been a wicket for the Fizz in his first over
Mustafizur to Nissanka, 1 run, short of a length around leg, Nissanka gets an inside edge towards short fine leg for a single
Mustafizur to Avishka Fernando, no run, back of a length delivery at the stumps, knocked down the pitch by Avishka Fernando

Mustafizur to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, was in the air for a long time, but falls short of the fielder at deep backward square leg. Mustafizur goes short and the batsman swipes it uppishly towards deep backward square leg. Saifuddin charges to his right, but can't reach there
Mustafizur to Nissanka, no run, tad short on middle and leg, Nissanka guides it back to Mustafizur. Only 4 runs from that over
Shoriful Islam to Avishka Fernando, B0$ Caught!!

Shoriful Islam to Avishka Fernando, B0$ Caught by Shamim Hossain!! The dropped catch hasn't cost much. This was pitched up by the bowler and Avishka Fernando whips it towards deep square leg. Shamim stationed there moves to his left, keeps his eyes on the ball and pouches it safely. Second wicket for Shoriful Islam and Bangladesh are right on top. B1$
Shoriful Islam to Asalanka, no run, back of a length delivery outside off, shaping away from the batsman, left alone
Shoriful Islam to Asalanka, no run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, knocked to cover-point by Asalanka

Shoriful Islam to Asalanka, B0$, a confident shot by the Sri Lankan captain. Shoriful Islam goes full and the batsman has thumped it right over the bowler's head with authority. Just lands in front of the cushions, one bounce and over the fence
Shoriful Islam to Asalanka, 1 run, drifting down the leg-side, nudged to fine leg for one
Shoriful Islam to Nissanka, no run, short and wide outside off, Nissanka slashes away from his body, gets beaten on the outside edge
Saifuddin to Asalanka, B0$ Caught!!

Saifuddin to Asalanka, B0$ Caught by Litton Das!! Yorker length delivery outside off, Asalanka tries to squeeze it out, gets beaten. Appeal for a caught behind, turned down! Litton has a word with his team-mates and decides to challenge the umpire's decision. Think the sound was of the bat hitting the ground. Hang on, there's some disturbance on UltraEdge when the ball is close to the cue end of the bat. He has nicked it and that's a successful review by Bangladesh. Sri Lanka are four down within the powerplay. Has been a good performance by the Bangladesh bowlers today. B1$
Saifuddin to Shanaka, B0$, fires a wide ball down the leg-side, Shanaka can't connect his glance
Saifuddin to Shanaka, no run, back of a length around off, punched in front of cover by Shanaka
Saifuddin to Shanaka, no run, tad short outside off, knocked in front of point by the batsman
Saifuddin to Shanaka, 1 run, low full toss on leg, flicked through square leg by Shanaka for a single
Saifuddin to Nissanka, 1 run, on the shorter side as Nissanka drags it through the leg-side for a single
Saifuddin to Shanaka, B0$, a boundary to end the powerplay. Short of a length delivery outside off, Shanaka opens the bat face and carves it through the point at backward point and short third man
Mustafizur to Nissanka, 1 run, dragged through square leg for a single by Nissanka
Mustafizur to Shanaka, 1 run, tucked to fine leg as the bowler goes short, a single taken
Mustafizur to Nissanka, no run, gets beaten by the fullish length delivery outside off
Mustafizur to Nissanka, no run, tad short outside off, chops it into the off-side
Mustafizur to Nissanka, 1 run, backs away, makes room and taps it into the off-side for one
Mustafizur to Shanaka, no run, banged in short by Mustafizur, Shanaka rides the bounce, guides it back to the bowler
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 2 runs, tad short outside off, punched through covers for a couple of runs
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 1 run, on his front foot to knock the floated delivery to long-on for one
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 2 runs, advances down the wicket to flick this through mid-wicket and a fumble in the deep results in the second run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run, clipped through the leg-side for a single by Shanaka

Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 2 runs, tad short on middle and leg, Nissanka goes down on his knee and sweeps it towards deep backward square leg, a couple of runs taken as Rishad stops it in front of the boundary
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 1 run, checks his shot and chips it to long-on for a single does Nissanka
Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, no run, touch short at the stumps, guided back to Rishad Hossain by Nissanka
Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, 1 run, dragged through backward square leg for a single
Rishad Hossain to Shanaka, 1 run, tad short on middle and leg, nudged towards square leg with soft hands
Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, 1 run, tad short around off, punched to long-on by Nissanka
Rishad Hossain to Shanaka, 1 run, tad short and the batsman has knocked it to long-on for one

Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, B0$, short ball by Rishad Hossain, Nissanka rocks back and pulls it towards deep mid-wicket. The fielder in the deep dives to his right and the ball drops just short of him. He gets his hands to it and the ball deflects away to the fence
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run, on the pads as Shanaka nudges it towards mid-wicket
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 1 run, reverse scoops this towards short third man where the fielder stops it by moving across his left
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run, that kept low as Shanaka bunts it to long-on for one
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 1 run, Mehidy Hasan Miraz goes short and the batsman pulls it to deep mid-wicket

Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, B0$, Shanaka goes down on his knee and sweeps this towards deep backward square leg, manages to beat the fielder and that's four more to the total. A useful partnership building for the 5th wicket
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 2 runs, fired down the leg-side, Shanaka goes for a sweep and the top edge flies over the keeper down the leg-side, a couple of runs taken
Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, B0$, juicy full toss by Rishad Hossain and the batsman has drilled it straight past the spinner for four runs
Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, B0$ Stumped!!

Rishad Hossain to Nissanka, B0$ Stumped!! Rishad Hossain has the last laugh! Nissanka advances down the wicket to play this, gets beaten by the leg-break and the keeper completes the formalities by whipping off the bails with ease. No chance of getting back in as Sri Lanka have lost half their side. Proving to be a disappointing performance by the hosts today. Bangladesh clicked with the bat and their bowlers are on song as well. Most of them have been amongst the wickets. B1$

Rishad Hossain to Karunaratne, no run, B0$ Another sharp leg-break outside off, Karunaratne gets drawn forward in defence and gets beaten. The keeps dislodges the bails, but his back foot was inside his crease
Rishad Hossain to Karunaratne, B0$ Caught&Bowled!!

Rishad Hossain to Karunaratne, B0$ Caught&Bowled!! Second wicket for Rishad Hossain. Tossed up delivery around off and Karunaratne has chipped it right back to Rishad Hossain. An easy return catch and Karunaratne walks back for a two-ball duck. Things getting worse for Sri Lanka with not much batting left. B1$
Rishad Hossain to Vandersay, 1 run, tad short on middle and leg, worked towards the on-side with a closed bat face
Rishad Hossain to Shanaka, 1 run, tossed up delivery outside off, steered to point for a single by Shanaka
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, B0$ Caught!!

Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, B0$ Caught by Tanzid Hasan!! The procession of wickets continues. Loopy delivery on middle and leg, Shanaka goes down on his knee and attempts the slogsweep. Doesn't time it well and it's a straightfoward chance for the fielder at deep mid-wicket. Shanaka was their last hope and even he's gone now. Bangladesh in a commanding position. B1$
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Theekshana, no run, tad short around off, Theekshana punches it towards cover where the fielder stops it
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Theekshana, 1 run, sharp off-break around middle and leg, Theekshana clips it through the leg-side for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Vandersay, no run, goes deep back in the crease and nudges it towards mid-wicket
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Vandersay, B0$, tossed up delivery around off, Vandersay stands tall and spanks it over the bowler's head for half-a-dozen. Morale boosting shot
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Vandersay, no run, goes down on his knee to play the reverse sweep, gets a top edge that hits the helmet grille
Saifuddin to Theekshana, 1 run, length ball by Saifuddin, Theekshana bunts it to long-on for a single
Saifuddin to Vandersay, 1 run, short and quick ball on middle and leg, Vandersay goes for a pull, miscues it towards square leg. Got hurried up due to the pace and bounce
Saifuddin to Theekshana, no run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, Theekshana drives it to covers
Saifuddin to Theekshana, 1 run, banged in short on middle and leg, Theekshana hooks it over backward square leg
Saifuddin to Vandersay, B0$ Caught!!

Saifuddin to Vandersay, B0$ Caught by Mustafizur!! Bangladesh inch closer to victory. A short ball by Saifuddin and the batsman has ramped it towards short fine leg. The fielder inside the circle moves back and takes a well-judged catch. Sri Lanka are eight down as Sanath Jayasuriya looks disappointed in the dugout. He removes his cap and has a worrisome face. B1$
Saifuddin to Binura Fernando, no run, yorker length ball as Binura Fernando digs it out towards mid-wicket
Rishad Hossain to Theekshana, 1 run, full toss outside off, driven to wide long-off for a single by Theekshana
Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, no run, googly outside off, Binura Fernando has a poke and misses
Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, 1 run, on the batsman's pads who nudges it through mid-wicket for one

Rishad Hossain to Theekshana, no run, tad short outside off, Theekshana plays away from his body as the outside edge drops short of the fielder at short third man. He was diving forward, but the ball landed in front of him
Rishad Hossain to Theekshana, 1 run, drifting on the pads, nudged to mid-wicket for one
Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, no run, tossed up delivery around off, Binura Fernando drives it to cover
Mustafizur to Theekshana, no run, advances down the wicket and tries to flat-bat this, gets an inside edge towards point
Mustafizur to Theekshana, B0$, banged in short by Mustafizur down the leg-side, left alone
The spectators have started leaving..
Mustafizur to Theekshana, 1 run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, steered to point for one

Mustafizur to Binura Fernando, B0$, an overpitched delivery by Mustafizur as Binura Fernando drills this past the non-striker for four runs. Some late entertainment for the Sri Lankan fans if not much
Mustafizur to Binura Fernando, no run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, on the slower side, Binura Fernando goes for a uppish drive and misses
Mustafizur to Binura Fernando, 1 run, tad short and Binura Fernando pulls it over mid-wicket for a single
Mustafizur to Theekshana, B0$ Caught!!

Mustafizur to Theekshana, B0$ Caught by Litton Das!! That's a clean catch by Litton Das and Sri Lanka have lost their ninth wicket. Was a slower delivery outside off and the batsman chased it with a drive. Gets a feather and the keeper has enough gloves underneath. Bangladesh only one wicket away from levelling the series in Dambulla. B1$
Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, no run, straighter delivery outside off, Binura Fernando gets beaten on the outside edge
Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, B0$, googly by Rishad Hossain but it's down the leg-side, called a wide
B0$ Is that the game? Yes, it is!
Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, B0$ Stumped!!

Rishad Hossain to Binura Fernando, B0$ Stumped!! Sri Lanka have been bowled out for 94. A loopy delivery outside off, Binura Fernando goes for a drive and misses. The keeper whips off the bails with the batsman's back foot in the air, and replays confirm that Binura Fernando is the last man out. The Bangladesh players celebrate and the Sri Lankan players look disappointed in the dugout.. B1$

B0$ A clinical performance by Bangladesh has helped them level the series 1-1 in Dambulla. The visitors lost the toss and their openers early today, but Litton Das played a captain's knock to steady the ship for them. Litton had a couple of crucial partnerships, first with Hridoy and later with Shamim. As a result of the contributions by these three batters, Bangladesh managed to post a challenging total at the end of 20 overs. In reply, Kusal Mendis was run-out by Shamim in the 2nd over itself and SL were put on the back foot early in the run chase. The hosts kept losing wickets at regular intervals following that and never looked comfortable in the run chase. Shoriful and Saifuddin took a couple of wickets, while Rishad Hossain was the pick of the bowlers as the leg-spinner claimed three wickets. SL eventually fell short by a massive margin of 83 runs and with the series levelled, the decider in Colombo should prove to be an interesting contest. Stay around for the presentations..

B0$ We were undone by bad batting and such good fielding by Bangladesh. As I mentioned because of bad batting, losing those wickets were crucial. Those (Mendis' run-out) kind of things can happen in cricket. We are in the same situation like we were in the ODIs. We need to come back stronger in the next game.

B0$ Have been trying to play good cricket, but that wasn't happening. Credit goes to Shamim, the way he batted, it was amazing. It was a good pitch to bat on. You had to take time on that surface. You could capitalize later. He (Rishad) is a big factor. When he bowls well, we are always in. That run-out by Shamim to remove Kusal Mendis was very important. He has been in very good form. Shoriful also bowled really well.

That brings an end to our live coverage of the second T20I folks. The series is levelled and the decider will be played on 16th July in Colombo. Do join us then! For now, it's goodbye from our side. You can switch tabs and follow the coverage of the India vs England Lord's Test..
